snippet: Angel Olsen performed a mesmerizing set of her stark, clean and direct songs at the Glasslands Gallery on Monday, and everyone paid attention.
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews performance by indie folk singer Angel Olsen at Glasslands Gallery.
lead_paragraph: Angel Olsen performed a mesmerizing set of her stark, clean and direct songs at the Glasslands Gallery on Monday, and everyone paid attention.

headline.seo: Angel Olsen at the Glasslands Gallery
headline.main: A Singer Finds Her Voice, and It Can Silence All Others
headline.print_headline: A Singer Finds Her Voice, and It Can Silence All Others
